data.text:
In the end, I was unable to clear up the misunderstanding that 
Taiki Shuttle had, and the next day had arrived.
data.processed:
<story>In the end, I was unable to clear up the misunderstanding that 
<story>Taiki Shuttle had, and the next day had arrived.

data.text:
Going with the flow in to a contract is probably a bad idea, 
so I went to look for her to explain-
data.processed:
<story>Going with the flow in to a contract is probably a bad idea, 
<story>so I went to look for her to explain-

data.text:
…In the central square, I found a group of lively Uma Musume, 
with Taiki Shuttle in the center.
data.processed:
<story>…In the central square, I found a group of lively Uma Musume, 
<story>with Taiki Shuttle in the center.

data.text:
Gulp…!! Fukukitaru, okay, 
I'm ready! Tell me your [Divination], please…!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Gulp…!! Fukukitaru, okay, 
<story>I'm ready! Tell me your [Divination], please…!

data.text: Okay! Here we go~…
data.name: Matikanefukukitaru
data.processed: <story>Okay! Here we go~…

data.text:
Even in anger, and in love, a star shines through… 
"Shiraoki-sama", bestow upon us your oracle…!
data.name: Matikanefukukitaru
data.processed:
<story>Even in anger, and in love, a star shines through… 
<story>"Shiraoki-sama", bestow upon us your oracle…!

data.text:
…hah…! I can see iiiiiiiit!!! In short, Taiki-san! 
This month, your lucky direction is… East South-East!!
data.name: Matikanefukukitaru
data.processed:
<story>…hah…! I can see iiiiiiiit!!! In short, Taiki-san! 
<story>This month, your lucky direction is… East South-East!!

data.text:
Oh yes!! 
I got it, Fukukitaru!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Oh yes!! 
<story>I got it, Fukukitaru!

data.text:
Which means, Suzuka!! The party's gonna be held in the East 
South-South… East-East? That's where it's gonna be!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Which means, Suzuka!! The party's gonna be held in the East 
<story>South-South… East-East? That's where it's gonna be!!

data.text:
Yeah, East South-East, right? East South-South East-East… what 
direction would that end up being…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, East South-East, right? East South-South East-East… what 
<story>direction would that end up being…?

data.text: Well well, don't sweat the small stuff!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>Well well, don't sweat the small stuff!!

data.text: That aside Suzuka, I hope you're looking forward to it!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>That aside Suzuka, I hope you're looking forward to it!

data.text:
It's a barbeque party so, 
we're gonna eat and eat until we're stuffed!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>It's a barbeque party so, 
<story>we're gonna eat and eat until we're stuffed!

data.text:
I-I'm glad you're inviting me but, 
eating until I'm stuffed is a little troubling…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>I-I'm glad you're inviting me but, 
<story>eating until I'm stuffed is a little troubling…

data.text:
But I'm glad for you, Taiki-san!! 
Congratulations on your trainer contract!
data.name: Matikanefukukitaru
data.processed:
<story>But I'm glad for you, Taiki-san!! 
<story>Congratulations on your trainer contract!

data.text:
Thank you, Fukukitaru!! 
You definitely should come too!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Thank you, Fukukitaru!! 
<story>You definitely should come too!

data.text:
I want to invite even more of my friends too~. 
Happy things become even happier when everyone is there!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>I want to invite even more of my friends too~. 
<story>Happy things become even happier when everyone is there!!

data.text:
Taiki Shuttle was surrounded by everyone, and was having 
a fun conversation… It seemed like she was a bright, 
amicable girl with lots of friends.
data.processed:
<story>Taiki Shuttle was surrounded by everyone, and was having 
<story>a fun conversation… It seemed like she was a bright, 
<story>amicable girl with lots of friends.

data.text:
-Trainer-san!! 
Howdy~~~!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>-Trainer-san!! 
<story>Howdy~~~!!

data.text:
Ehehe, I saw that you were here so I came over! 
I'm looking forward to today's training!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Ehehe, I saw that you were here so I came over! 
<story>I'm looking forward to today's training!!

data.text:
I'm, well~, told pretty often that my concentration skills are 
kinda bad but… Don't worry!! I'll do my best!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>I'm, well~, told pretty often that my concentration skills are 
<story>kinda bad but… Don't worry!! I'll do my best!

data.text:
…when she's showing this much motiviation, 
I'd feel really bad if I just flat out turned her down.
data.processed:
<story>…when she's showing this much motiviation, 
<story>I'd feel really bad if I just flat out turned her down.

data.text: The first thing I should do, is harden my heart and-

choices.text: Looking forward to working with you, Taiki Shuttle!
choices.processed: <size=32>Looking forward to working with you, Taiki Shuttle!</size>

choices.text: Looking forward to working with you, Taiki Shuttle!
choices.processed: <size=32>Looking forward to working with you, Taiki Shuttle!</size>

data.processed: <story>The first thing I should do, is harden my heart and-

data.text: Yeah!! Looking forward to working with you!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>Yeah!! Looking forward to working with you!!

data.text:
And so, Taiki Shuttle's 
first training session came, but-
data.processed:
<story>And so, Taiki Shuttle's 
<story>first training session came, but-

data.text:
-Ah! Suzukaaaa~~!! 
Howdy~~!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>-Ah! Suzukaaaa~~!! 
<story>Howdy~~!!

data.text: Ah, Taiki… Stop! Please don't jump at me.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Ah, Taiki… Stop! Please don't jump at me.

data.text:
Oh!!…how sad. 
Hugs are a sign of affection though!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Oh!!…how sad. 
<story>Hugs are a sign of affection though!

data.text:
Well yours are just a bit too… spirited… 
anyways, aren't you in the middle of training?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Well yours are just a bit too… spirited… 
<story>anyways, aren't you in the middle of training?

data.text: Oh, that's right!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>Oh, that's right!!

data.text:
Trainer-san, I'm sorry for suddenly dashing off like that! 
I spotted Suzuka, so I couldn't help myself.
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san, I'm sorry for suddenly dashing off like that! 
<story>I spotted Suzuka, so I couldn't help myself.

data.text:
Oh, I know!! Since we've come this far, 
how about training together with Suzuka?!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Oh, I know!! Since we've come this far, 
<story>how about training together with Suzuka?!

data.text:
Eh? Um… 
I-is that fine, Trainer-san…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Eh? Um… 
<story>I-is that fine, Trainer-san…?

data.text:
…I didn't have any plans, but having someone as 
strong as Silence Suzuka do some parallel-running 
training, was honestly greatly appreciated.
data.processed:
<story>…I didn't have any plans, but having someone as 
<story>strong as Silence Suzuka do some parallel-running 
<story>training, was honestly greatly appreciated.

data.text:
Understood. Today I was planning on doing some long distance 
running so, do you mind if we head outside the school grounds?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Understood. Today I was planning on doing some long distance 
<story>running so, do you mind if we head outside the school grounds?

data.text: Outside?! Sounds like fun!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>Outside?! Sounds like fun!!

data.text:
Absolutely no problem! 
Let's go, let's go!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Absolutely no problem! 
<story>Let's go, let's go!

data.text:
Wait wait, Taiki, just now 
I was asking Trainer-san, you know…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Wait wait, Taiki, just now 
<story>I was asking Trainer-san, you know…?

data.text:
Off we goooooo!! 
Yahoooooo!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Off we goooooo!! 
<story>Yahoooooo!!

data.text: Ah?! Wai-…W-We'll be off then!!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Ah?! Wai-…W-We'll be off then!!

data.text:
While wondering if everything was going to be fine, I waited by 
the front gate for them to return. And then-
data.processed:
<story>While wondering if everything was going to be fine, I waited by 
<story>the front gate for them to return. And then-

data.text: Haa, haa, haa… we've returned.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Haa, haa, haa… we've returned.

data.text:
Eh?…H-huh?! I'm pretty sure 
she was just running right behind me…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Eh?…H-huh?! I'm pretty sure 
<story>she was just running right behind me…!

data.text:
S-sorry…! She has a tendency to run off and talk to anyone, and 
I thought I was being careful about that but…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>S-sorry…! She has a tendency to run off and talk to anyone, and 
<story>I thought I was being careful about that but…!

data.text:
When I'm running I tend to get so focused… 
I-I'm really sorry!!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>When I'm running I tend to get so focused… 
<story>I-I'm really sorry!!

data.text:
Together with Silence Suzuka, we looked around 
the running course they had taken to try to find Taiki Shuttle…
data.processed:
<story>Together with Silence Suzuka, we looked around 
<story>the running course they had taken to try to find Taiki Shuttle…

data.text:
BANG!! 
…Yes! Another bull's eye!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>BANG!! 
<story>…Yes! Another bull's eye!

data.text: Ah, Taiki's voice…! Let's go take a look!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Ah, Taiki's voice…! Let's go take a look!

data.text:
Let me try, let me try, I wanna do it next! 
Onee-chan, show me how!!
data.name: Girl A
data.processed:
<story>Let me try, let me try, I wanna do it next! 
<story>Onee-chan, show me how!!

data.text:
Leave it to me, the gunman that never misses!! Even with a toy 
pistol like this, I could become the hero of a Western~!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Leave it to me, the gunman that never misses!! Even with a toy 
<story>pistol like this, I could become the hero of a Western~!

data.text: Taiki! Thank goodness, we found you here…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Taiki! Thank goodness, we found you here…!

data.text:
Oh, Suzuka and Trainer-san! 
Why are you both so flustered, is something wrong?
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Oh, Suzuka and Trainer-san! 
<story>Why are you both so flustered, is something wrong?

data.text:
Wait, Oooooooooh!! Sorry!! 
I was in the middle of a run…!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Wait, Oooooooooh!! Sorry!! 
<story>I was in the middle of a run…!

data.text: Taiki…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Taiki…

data.text:
…The days with Taiki Shuttle, 
looked like they were going to be long.
data.processed:
<story>…The days with Taiki Shuttle, 
<story>looked like they were going to be long.

data.text:
Well, I made some cute friends, 
or something like that… P-please forgive me…!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Well, I made some cute friends, 
<story>or something like that… P-please forgive me…!
